title: Ōtake, Hiroshima
text:
is a <a href="Cities%20of%20Japan">city</a> located in <a href="Hiroshima%20Prefecture">Hiroshima Prefecture</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>.
As of May 1, 2017, the city has an estimated <a href="population">population</a> of 27,684, with 12,939 <a href="household">household</a>s, and a <a href="population%20density">population density</a> of 350 persons per km2. The total area is 78.57 km2.
Sister cities.
